name: Rick's Best Chicken Parmesan
author: Ricky Toms
summary: Crunchy chicken Parmesan that your family will love. Everyone I have made this for has told me it's the best chicken Parmesan ever. Serve over your favorite pasta with your favorite sauce (I use marinara). Sometimes I sprinkle mozzarella cheese over my chicken as well as the Parmesan. I also garnish with chopped fresh basil.
ingredients: ¼ cup crushed fish-shaped crackers (such as Goldfish®)
directions: Place chicken breasts between 2 sheets of heavy plastic on a solid, level surface
Firmly pound with the smooth side of a meat mallet to 1/2-inch thickness
Combine flour, crackers, 1 1/2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a resealable plastic bag
Beat eggs in a shallow bowl
Dip chicken breasts into eggs to coat; place in flour mixture and seal bag
Toss chicken in the flour mixture until well covered
Heat oil in a skillet over high heat
Add chicken breasts; cook until underside is browned and crispy, 4 to 5 minutes
Flip; sprinkle 1 teaspoon Parmesan cheese over each chicken breast
Spoon hot oil over cheese until melted
Drain on paper towels for 2 to 3 minutes before serving
